sentence.Network_en: High interest rates do not point to a buoyant market this year.
sentence.Network_cn: 今年的高利率并不表明市场繁荣。

sentence.Network_en: Analysts expect the share price to remain buoyant.
sentence.Network_cn: 分析家们预期股票价格将持续上涨。

sentence.Network_en: It takes a very buoyant personality to cope with constant rejection.
sentence.Network_cn: 接受一再遭拒的结果需要非常乐天的性格.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French bouyant or Spanish boyante, present participle of boyar 'to float' (see buoy)

entry.tran: 心情愉快的；生气勃勃的
entry.def: If you are in a buoyant mood, you feel cheerful and behave in a lively way.

example.ex: She was in a buoyant mood and they were looking forward to their new life...
example.tran: 她心情愉快，他们正在憧憬未来的新生活。

example.ex: You will feel more buoyant and optimistic about the future than you have for a long time.
example.tran: 对于未来，你的感觉会比过去很长一段时间里更加自信和乐观。

entry.def: A buoyant economy is a successful one in which there is a lot of trade and economic activity.

example.ex: We have a buoyant economy and unemployment is considerably lower than the regional average...
example.tran: 我们经济繁荣，失业率远低于地区平均水平。

example.ex: High interest rates do not point to a buoyant market this year...
example.tran: 今年的高利率并不表明市场繁荣。

entry.def: A buoyant object floats on a liquid.

example.ex: This was such a small and buoyant boat...
While there is still sufficient trapped air within the container to keep it buoyant, it will float.
example.tran: 只要容器里还留有足够的空气，它就会漂浮着。

means.word_mean: 1. tending to float on a liquid or rise in air or gas;

auth_sentence.content: We've still got a reasonably buoyant fishery.
auth_sentence.res_content: We've still got a reasonably buoyant fishery.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We've still got a reasonably buoyant fishery.

auth_sentence.content: It has a buoyant acrobatic flight with widely spread primaries.
auth_sentence.res_content: It has a buoyant acrobatic flight with widely spread primaries.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It has a buoyant acrobatic flight with widely spread primaries.

auth_sentence.content: St Mirren will be buoyant after their League Cup win.
auth_sentence.res_content: St Mirren will be buoyant after their League Cup win.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: St Mirren will be buoyant after their League Cup win.

sentences.en: Cork is a very buoyant material.
sentences.cn: 软木是极易浮起的材料。

sentences.en: A boat must be made of buoyant material.
sentences.cn: 船一定要用有浮力的材料来做。

means.word_mean: 轻松愉快的, 开朗的, 容易复原的

sentences.en: It takes a very buoyant personality to cope with constant rejection.
sentences.cn: 接受一再遭拒的结果需要非常乐天的性格。

sentences.en: We were in a buoyant mood after winning our match.
sentences.cn: 我们赢了比赛,心情很振奋。
